name: Flappy Invanders
description:
Welcome to Flappy Invanders

Flappy Bird like game. You are Flappy a small yellow bird and you have to save the earth ! Are you wondering how ? I will tell you how ! You just have to kill the invanders using eggs ! It's a piece of cake isn't it ?

But there is a couple of things you don't know :

  • Fisrt thing first you can't save
  • Second thing second you can buy things in the shop
  • Third thing third there is about 3 or 4 power ups

Okay now the controls :

  • Jump with the space key
  • And shootwith the mouse left button
